articles.author: Charles Bradley
articles.title: F1 qualifying results: Verstappen takes Bahrain GP pole - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Red Bull’s Max Verstappen took pole position for the Bahrain Grand Prix, the opening round of the 2023 Formula 1 World Championship, on Saturday.
articles.content: Verstappen will start ahead of Red Bull Racing team-mate Sergio Perez and Ferraris Charles Leclerc after the one-hour qualifying session, which is split into three segments with five cars each being … [+4908 chars]
